content:
Indeed it is! Minas Tirith, also known as the White City, is the capital of Gondor and one of the most impressive cities in Middle-earth. The walls of the city are built in seven levels, each one rising higher than the last, and are protected by soldiers known as the Tower Guard. The city is also home to the Steward of Gondor and the Citadel, where the ruling class resides.

As you can see the front gate is impressive and the first thing that catches the eye, it's called the Great Gate, it's made of iron and it's guarded by the men of the Tower Guard, also you can see the symbol of the White Tree of Gondor, it's a symbol of the royalty and the hope of the city.

Shall we move on to the next level?
